heading: HR00978
0: A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE RECENT ATTACKS MADE BY MEMBERS OF THE NEW PEOPLE'S ARMY ON CIVILIAN ESTABLISHMENTS IN DAVAO CITY AND URGING BOTH THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE COMMUNIST PARTY OF THE PHILIPPINES-NEW PEOPLE'S ARMY-NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT (CPP-NPA-NDF) TO ADOPT A BILATERAL CEASEFIRE AGREEMENT
status: Pending with the Committee on PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY since 2017-05-15
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00978
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE RECENT ATTACKS MADE BY MEMBERS OF THE NEW PEOPLE'S ARMY ON CIVILIAN ESTABLISHMENTS IN DAVAO CITY AND URGING BOTH THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE COMMUNIST PARTY OF THE PHILIPPINES-NEW PEOPLE'S ARMY-NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT (CPP-NPA-NDF) TO ADOPT A BILATERAL CEASEFIRE AGREEMENT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY ON 2017-05-15
